description: Number of simplices in barycentric subdivision of n-simplex.
references: R. Austin, R. K. Guy, and R. Nowakowski, unpublished notes, circa 1987.
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
formula: Essentially Stirling numbers of second kind - see A028246.
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_.
